item.title: Generating Signed Language Instructions in Large-Scale Dialogue Systems
item.description: https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.14026 This paper presents a goal-oriented conversational AI system that generates American Sign Language (ASL) instructions using large language models and retrieval methods, incorporating feedback from the Deaf and Hard-of-Hearing community to ensure effectiveness and accessibility.

item.title: Style-Compress: An LLM-Based Prompt Compression Framework Considering Task-Specific Styles
item.description: https://arxiv.org/abs/2410.14042 Style-Compress is a prompt compression framework that utilizes smaller language models to efficiently generate task-specific compressed prompts for larger models, achieving improved performance and reduced computational costs across various downstream tasks.
